alert.note: Alert for Bent; Las Animas; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 6:44PM MDT until June 16 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Eastern Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... Southwestern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 715 PM MDT. * At 644 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Higbee to 25 miles north of Kim, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Otero, eastern Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
